org.netbeans.api.search

Class SearchPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.SearchPattern

  • public final class SearchPattern
extends Object
    Pattern describes the search conditions

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SearchPattern.MatchType
      Specifies how the pattern is matched to the searched text.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static SearchPattern create(String searchExpression,
                                   boolean wholeWords,
                                   boolean matchCase,
                                   boolean regExp)
        Creates a new SearchPattern in accordance with given parameters
        Parameters:
        searchExpression - non-null String of a searched text
        wholeWords - if true, only whole words were searched
        matchCase - if true, case sensitive search was preformed
        regExp - if true, regular expression search was performed; if false, search with basic wildcards was performed
        Returns:
        a new SearchPattern in accordance with given parameters

      • create

        public static SearchPattern create(String searchExpression,
                                   boolean wholeWords,
                                   boolean matchCase,
                                   SearchPattern.MatchType matchType)
        Creates a new SearchPattern in accordance with given parameters
        Parameters:
        searchExpression - non-null String of a searched text
        wholeWords - if true, only whole words were searched
        matchCase - if true, case sensitive search was preformed
        matchType - match type
        Returns:
        a new SearchPattern in accordance with given parameters
        Since:
        api.search/1.11
